Package com.teragrep.cfe_16.ThirdParty.SyslogMessageSender

Class SyslogMessageSender

java.lang.Object
com.cloudbees.syslog.sender.AbstractSyslogMessageSender
com.teragrep.cfe_16.ThirdParty.SyslogMessageSender.SyslogMessageSender
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.cloudbees.syslog.sender.SyslogMessageSender, Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class SyslogMessageSender extends com.cloudbees.syslog.sender.AbstractSyslogMessageSender implements Closeable
See RFC 6587 - Transmission of Syslog Messages over TCP
Author:
Cyrille Le Clerc

    • syslogServerHostnameReference

      protected com.cloudbees.syslog.util.CachingReference<InetAddress> syslogServerHostnameReference
      InetAddress of the remote Syslog Server. The InetAddress is refreshed regularly to handle DNS changes (default SyslogMessageSender.DEFAULT_INET_ADDRESS_TTL_IN_MILLIS) Default value: SyslogMessageSender.DEFAULT_SYSLOG_HOST

    • syslogServerPort

      protected int syslogServerPort
      Listen port of the remote Syslog server. Default: SyslogMessageSender.DEFAULT_SYSLOG_PORT

    • trySendErrorCounter

      protected final AtomicInteger trySendErrorCounter
      Number of exceptions trying to send message.
